Name: Bang Bang Fruit 2
About the game: Bang Bang Fruit 2 - is a simple puzzle game in which you will feel like a pastry chef and complete cooking a beautiful cake. - 30 levels - Steam achievements Controls: LMB -Shot, R - Restart level Credits: This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Neocoda.
